items.title: Dixon shines in Q4 with blockbuster growth numbers
items.description: Backward integration, improving wallet share, and new product development will be key growth drivers

items.title: Urban India spending nearly 50 percent of food budget on dining out and deliveries: Deloitte-FICCI report
items.description: Among the factors driving this trend is the shifting consumer preference towards snacking, demand for on-the-go formats due to faster urbanization and more women joining workforce, along with easier access to e-commerce options.

items.title: Axis AMC's Nachiket Naik says new credit AIF to be fully deployed by July, not chasing 'beauty contest of returns'
items.description: Axis AMC's Nachiket Naik said the roughly Rs 740 crore fund - anchored by insurers, corporate treasuries and family offices - is focused on fully secured transactions with an A- rating for the average portfolio.

items.title: Belrise IPO: A growth-oriented play in auto ancillaries
items.description: The company stands at an inflection point with sharper focus on high-margin segments

items.title: Which companies are key beneficiaries of the defence indigenisation push?
items.description: Multi-decade opportunities unfolding across critical segments on the back of new technologies and initiatives

items.title: Mankind Pharma net profit drops 10% to Rs 477 crore on one-off costs
items.description: The company has a net debt of Rs 5,784 crore, which translates into net debt to adjusted EBITDA ratio of 1.8x.

items.title: Temporary blip due to Indo-Pak tensions, but luxury hotels to recover soon: Brookfield ahead of Leela IPO
items.description: Brookfield Asset Management-promoted Leela Palaces, Hotels, and Resorts is preparing to list as Schloss Bangalore Ltd in a Rs 3,500 crore initial public offering

items.title: ONGC posts 20% decline in Q4 net profit at Rs 8,856 crore, declares dividend of Rs 1.25/share
items.description: The company had reported a net profit of Rs 9,783.64 crore in the December quarter.
